entries.original: **fix(hooks):** AskUserQuestion notification now fires at PreToolUse instead of PostToolUse — Discord/Telegram alerts arrive while Claude is waiting for input, not after the user already answered (#597)
entries.translation: **fix(hooks):** AskUserQuestion 알림이 이제 PostToolUse 대신 PreToolUse에서 발생합니다 — Discord/Telegram 알림이 사용자가 이미 응답한 후가 아니라 Claude가 입력을 기다리는 동안 도착합니다 (#597)

entries.original: **feat(skills):** Add user feedback step between Planner and Architect/Critic in consensus mode (#600)
entries.translation: **feat(skills):** 합의 모드에서 Planner와 Architect/Critic 사이에 사용자 피드백 단계를 추가 (#600)

entries.original: **fix(skills):** Mandate structured approval and ralph handoff in consensus mode (#595)
entries.translation: **fix(skills):** 합의 모드에서 구조화된 승인과 ralph 전달을 의무화 (#595)

entries.original: **fix(commands):** Remove commands/ directory self-loop in omc-setup (#582)
entries.translation: **fix(commands):** omc-setup에서 commands/ 디렉토리의 자기 참조 제거 (#582)

entries.original: **fix(installer):** Preserve custom statusLine config on forced update (#567)
entries.translation: **fix(installer):** 강제 업데이트 시 사용자 정의 statusLine 설정 보존 (#567)

entries.original: Updated rate-limit-wait, HUD limits, usage-api, installer
entries.translation: rate-limit-wait, HUD 제한, usage-api, installer 업데이트
